inclusion.criterion: Must understand the risks and the benefits/purpose of the study and provide signed and dated informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be 18 years at time of signing the informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in all required evaluations and procedures in the study including the ability to swallow pills without difficulty.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Increasing or changing dose of topical therapy within 14 days of study day 0 (including but not limited to topical corticosteroids, tacrolimus, pimecrolimus).
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease. She does not have any conditions that would make her ineligible for the study.
